entry.title: About
entry.summary: Hi, I'm Morten I'm tightening bolts and nuts, giving layers of paint, and more, on the websites of local TV station TV MIDTVEST in DK. Oh, and I'm also a librarian.
entry.content:
Hi, I'm Morten

I'm tightening bolts and nuts, giving layers of paint, and more, on the websites of local TV station TV MIDTVEST in DK. Oh, and I'm also a librarian.
